item.title: RAG Fundamentals - the vanilla RAG framework mind map
item.author: Author
item.description: I recently came across an insightful article: RAG Fundamentals First, which delved into the fundamentals of RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) To further process and organize my understanding of the topic, I created a mind map that summarizes the key concepts and relationships of the vanilla RAG framework: The vanilla RAG framework mind map: MindMap PNG MindMap SVG - (Links working) Preview
